items.question: How long does it take to create the site?
items.answer: It depends on complexity, but generally 5-10 working days for standard showcase sites.

items.question: Does the site work on mobile devices?
items.answer: Absolutely! All sites are responsive and optimized for smartphones and tablets.

items.question: Can I modify the content myself?
items.answer: It depends on the package you choose. For some projects I provide a simple interface to update content, while for others I handle the updates myself.

items.question: Is post-launch support included?
items.answer: Yes, I offer ongoing technical support and help with any changes or issues.

items.question: Will the site be optimized for Google?
items.answer: Every site includes basic SEO optimization to improve visibility on search engines.
